cause.description:
When a child is born or diagnosed with a serious illness, the entire family feels the pain. Chai Lifeline is a not for profit organization that provides crucial emotional and social support that helps the family cope with the diagnosis, treatment, and repercussions of life-threatening or lifelong pediatric illness.
Chai Lifeline’s guiding philosophy is that a seriously ill child needs and deserves as happy and normal a childhood as possible. Its two-dozen, year-round programs and services are designed to restore a sense of normalcy and well being not only to the stricken child, but also to every member of the family. All services are free of charge.
1. Chai Lifeline. Fighting Illness with Love.
cause.mission: Chai Lifeline is a not for profit organization dedicated to bringing help, hope and support to seriously ill children and their families.
